name: Crown OG
description: Crown OG is an indica strain that stays true to its OG roots with a sweet pine aroma and potent euphoric effects. While Crown OG may take a toll on your memory and cognitive sharpness, its crushing THC content is perfect for patients suffering severe pain or insomnia. This strain took 1st place in the 2015 High Times Denver Cannabis Cup as “Best Indica Concentrate,” earning the victorious stripes its name sets forth.
descriptionPlain: Crown OG is an indica strain that stays true to its OG roots with a sweet pine aroma and potent euphoric effects. While Crown OG may take a toll on your memory and cognitive sharpness, its crushing THC content is perfect for patients suffering severe pain or insomnia. This strain took 1st place in the 2015 High Times Denver Cannabis Cup as “Best Indica Concentrate,” earning the victorious stripes its name sets forth.

highlightedReviews.text: Picked up this beauty at The Famous Healers in LA, (honestly) the best OG I've had in all my 6+ years of smoking... can't be missed, def has some sativa euphoria.

Crown OG is a great strain! All the amazing effects of an Indica, but the same wonderful brain buzz from a good, relaxing Sativa strain. super beautiful buds, dense and sticky, and the smoke tastes great! I LOVE LOVE LOVE that this strain doesnt cause me any anxiety (or paranoia), because even some Indicas do... i have really bad anxiety so that may  be why... and some Indicas sort of inadvertently cause me a bit of anxiety, yet with Crown OG i just feel relaxed! GREAT strain for Indica users, and id even recommend this strain to those who are into Hybrids (esp. sativa dominant, because this strain doesnt couch-bound you like a super strong sedating Indica would.) All in all, give it a try! Most clinics in my area, South Orange County carry it regularly! STAY LIFTED, yall!

articles.title: New Strains Alert: The 2015 Michigan Cannabis Cup Winners
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Breeders and growers duked it out last weekend in Michigan for yet another High Times Cannabis Cup. The best of the best were pitted against each other, and we're curious how many of you have had the pleasure of trying these champs. Share your thoughts in a strain review or check out where to find these elite genetics at a shop near you by navigating to their strain page and clicking "Availability."
Without further ado, here are your 2015 winners!
 
CANNABIS FLOWER WINNERS

Best Indica Flower
1st Place: Zkittlez from 3rd Gen Family with Terphogz and The Union
2nd Place: Strawberry Banana from Greenwolf Oregon with G.C. Rebellion Farms
3rd Place: Deathwalker OG from Radicle Genetics in collaboration with Lenz and Valerio
 
Best Sativa Flower
1st Place: Strawberry Banana from Mass Genetics
2nd Place: Tropicana from Cannabiotix
3rd Place: Dreamy Jones from Bud White at Interlochen Alternative Health
 
Best Hybrid Flower
1st Place: Sunshine #4 by Bodhi Seeds from The Green Room Detroit
2nd Place: Savant’s Grail from 710 Savant
3rd Place: Crown OG from Crown OG with A Detroit Alternative and Moxie 71
 
Best CBD Flower
1st Place: Perkins Cut Cannatonic from Mota Rebel Genetics
2nd Place: CBDee’s #1B from Pure West Compassion Club with LightSky Farms
3rd Place: Super Sonic CBD from Radicle Genetics in collaboration with Valerio
 
CANNABIS CONCENTRATE WINNERS

Best Indica Concentrate
1st Place: Faygo Red Pop Live Resin from 710 Savant
2nd Place: Grape Valley Kush Live Resin from PeaceOil
3rd Place: Moxie Goji Live Resin from A Detroit Alternative
 
Best Sativa Concentrate
1st Place: Clementine Live Resin from Crockett Family Farms
2nd Place: Romulan Grenade’s Live Plant Run from LightSky Farms with NLG
3rd Place: Tangie Live Resin from Greenwolf Oregon and Moxie Genetics
 
Best Hybrid Concentrate
1st Place: Strawberry Banana Lemonade from Greenwolf Oregon and Moxie 710
2nd Place: Strawberry Banana from Loud Pack Extracts Oregon with Moxie Mix
3rd Place: Crown OG from Moxie Genetics with ADA East
 
Best Non-Solvent Hash
1st Place: Goji Rosin from Moxie Seeds & Extracts with ADA East and Foundation Extracts
2nd Place: Moxie Solventless Goji 120-micron from A Detroit Alternative
3rd Place: 73-micron Bruce Banner #3 Freeze Dried Water Hash from Michigan Made Melts in collaboration with Kushmanjockin
 
Best CBD Concentrate
1st Place: CBD Cookies / Cannatonic / Cannasphere from Kannacare in collaboration with TerpTitan
2nd Place: CBDee’s #1B Live Plant Run from Pure West Compassion Club with LightSky Farms
3rd Place: Startonic Sap from Genotype A2 with A2 Wellness
 
CANNABIS PRODUCT WINNERS

Best Cannabis Edible
1st Place: Kief Krispy from Budsuds with R.I. Finest and Kief Krispy
2nd Place: Captain Kirk’s Truffle Tropicales from Captain Kirk Edibles of Ann Arbor Health Collective
3rd Place: Got Milk? From Mindright
 
Best CBD Cannabis Edible
1st Place: Special Fx Labs CBD Dark Chocolate Mint from Jackson County Compassion Center
2nd Place: Cherry Almond Sherbet Delight – CBD Special from Arborside Delights
3rd Place: CBDee’s Strawberry Lemonade from LightSky Farms with NLG
 
Best Cannabis Topical
1st Place: PBO from PBOHeals.com
2nd Place: Budsuds Purple Chem Topical Soap Bar from Budsuds with R.I. Finest and The Cali Connection
3rd Place: Truu Hemp Infused Lotion from Mindright
 
Best Cannabis Product
1st Place: MOXIE | Moxie Mix
2nd Place: Raw Papers | HBI
3rd Place: Advanced Nutrients | Advanced Nutrients
 
Best Glass
1st Place: We Grow Michigan | Joe P x SD Ryno “Devil Duck Bot”
2nd Place: Sacred Expressions | The Collector
3rd Place: Nexus Glass | Tesla V3
 
Best Vaporizer
1st Place: Puff Co | Puff Co
2nd Place: VaporZ | VaporZ
3rd Place: WildBill’s Tobacco | Honey Pen

articles.title: The 2015 NorCal Cannabis Cup Winners
articles.author: Lisa Rough
articles.text:
There was some beautiful competition at the NorCal High Times Cannabis Cup this past weekend and we were there to cover all of the action. Among all of the hubbub and hoopla, here are the winners of this year’s 2015 NorCal Cannabis Cup:
 
CANNABIS FLOWER WINNERS

Best Sativa Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Schlemons by The Source Genetics
2nd Place: Super Silver Haze by Life is Good
3rd Place: Super Glue by Vallejo Patients Care
 
Best Indica Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Zkittles by 3rd Gen Family
2nd Place: Kosher Kush from DNA by Greenwolf Los Angeles and Cali Kush Farms
3rd Place: 24K OG Kush by Strain Collective with Pearl Pharma
 
Best Hybrid Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Orange Crush by Cannabiotix
2nd Place: Tahoe Chem by C.R.A.F.T.
3rd Place: Chiquita Banana by Utopia Meds – Santa Cruz
 
Best CBD Cannabis Flower
1st Place: CBD OG by C.R.A.F.T.
2nd Place: Doctor Cookies by Northstar Holistic Collective
3rd Place: Sunkiss CBD by California Growers Guild
 
CANNABIS CONCENTRATE WINNERS

Best Sativa Cannabis Concentrates
1st Place: Citrix #4 by Gold Coast Collection with Apothecary 420
2nd Place: Purple Tangie by Zeinstein Gardens & Loudpack Extracts
3rd Place: Double Tangie Banana by Crockett Family Farms
 
Best Indica Cannabis Concentrates
1st Place: AHHS Brand OG by Alternative Herbal Health Services
2nd Place: Banana OG by Crockett Family Farms
3rd Place: Crown OG Live Resin by Prime Extractions
 
Best Hybrid Cannabis Concentrates
1st Place: Emperors Mandarins “Shatter” by the Kind Center with Unregistered Extracts
2nd Place: Emperors Mandarins by Greenwolf Collective X Cali Kush Farms
3rd Place: Crown OG x Dab Vader OG Zombie Resin by Crown Genetics
 
Best Non-Solvent Hash Products
1st Place: Kimbo Kush Cubantech Drysift by Cubanhashqueen with Exotic Genetix
2nd Place: Cookies & Cream Cubantech Drysift by Exotic Genetix
3rd Place: Peaches ‘N Cream by Full Flava Extracts with E.T. Extracts
 
CANNABIS-INFUSED EDIBLE WINNERS

1st Place: Dark Chocolate Macaroons by Utopia Meds
2nd Place: Pineapple Delight Bites by Lifted Edibles
3rd Place: Cinnamon Maple Tree Hugger – Om Edibles & Gold Drop Collaboration
 
CANNABIS TOPICAL WINNERS

1st Place: Crown OG “It’s the Balm Haling Salve” by Crown Genetics
2nd Place: Honey Pot Bear Butter by Honey Pot with Pure Joy Collective
3rd Place: Absorb CBD Topical Relief by Absorb with Seasonal Apothecary
 
HIGH CBD PRODUCT WINNERS

Best High CBD Cannabis Concentrates
1st Place: Goji D.C. Live Resin by Moxie Genetics
2nd Place: ACDC by Scapegoat Genetics
3rd Place: ACDC by Dankman Extrax
 
Best High CBD Cannabis Edibles
1st Place: Raw CBD Sipping Cacao by Om Edibles All Female Collective
2nd Place: Beezle’s CBD Brulee – Chocolate Orange by Beezle Extracts
3rd Place: CBD/THC Honey by Baked Beez with the W.E.E.D. Studio City
